snippet: The teenager was abducted from a shantytown and beaten last week by as many as a dozen people in an attack that drew condemnation from politicians and rights groups.
abstract: French authorities say teenage Roma boy is in a coma in a Paris hospital after being abducted from a shantytown and beaten by as many as a dozen people; say assault was apparent retaliation for boy's alleged burglary attempt in nearby housing project.

byline.original: By SCOTT SAYARE and MAÏA de la BAUME

lead_paragraph: The teenager was abducted from a shantytown and beaten last week by as many as a dozen people in an attack that drew condemnation from politicians and rights groups.

headline.main: Roma Boy, 16, Is Comatose After Beating Outside Paris
headline.print_headline: Roma Boy, 16, Is Comatose After Beating Outside Paris
